text: Korasion ruins Korasion, also called Kalon Korakesion, was a town of ancient Cilicia, on the coast a little to the east of Seleucia ad Calycadnum, inhabited during the Roman and Byzantine eras. Its site is tentatively located near Susanoğlu in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cilicia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Mersin Province
title: Korasion
